utilities
Class format_matrix

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--utilities.format_matrix
public class format_matrix
extends java.lang.Object

Overview

This class provides a quick static class convert arrays contents into strings for printing purposes. Users can choses either the default system string reresentation of a floating point number (i.e. what toString would produce), use a c-style formating string, or specify a total number of digits to represent float values with.

Version:
1.0 (October 2001)
Author:
Tony Held
